content: 1 1 half_double_crochet in first 3 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st continue around and join with slip_stitch 60 sts 6 chain 2 1 double_crochet in first 4 sts 2 double_crochet in next st continue around and join with slip_stitch 72 sts at this point the circle measures about 5-⅟2 in diameter 7 chain 1 bpsc around join with slip_stitch 8 chain 2 double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 9 chain 2 double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 10 repeat steps 7 thru 9 two more times 11 chain 1 bpsc around join with slip_stitch 12 chain 2 double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 2 | pa ge 13 chain 2 1 cluster in stitch chain 1 skip next stitch around join with slip_stitch - 36 clusters 14 chain 1 single_crochet in each stitch around join with slip_stitch 15 repeat step 13 16 chain 2 double_crochet in each st around 17 chain 1 bpsc around join with slip_stitch 18 chain 1 single_crochet in each stitch around join with slip_stitch 19 repeat step 18 20 fasten_off finishing cut the yarn leaving enough yarn end to weave in with the darning needle steam or block your hat if desired enjoy wearing your hat or the anticipation of the joy it will bring to the recipient of the gift or donation 3 | pa ge
